text: The 2017–18 Slovenian PrvaLiga (also known as the Prva liga Telekom Slovenije for sponsorship reasons) was the 27th edition of the Slovenian PrvaLiga since its establishment in 1991. The season began on 15 July 2017 and ended on 27 May 2018. ==Competition format== Each team played 36 matches (18 home and 18 away). Teams played four matches against each other (2 home and 2 away). ==Teams== A total of ten teams contested the league, including eight from the 2016–17 Slovenian PrvaLiga and two promoted from the 2016–17 Slovenian Second League. ===Stadia and locations=== Seating capacity only; some stadiums also have standing areas.
